1.content: Welcome! Your journey awaits but first we need you start you off at a city. Where should you start?
1.title: Game Start!

11.content: You're starting in Luin eh? Okay let's go!
11.title: Luin the City of Rebirth (Tales of Symphonia)

111.content:
Name: Ryu

Gender: Male

Age: 22

Species: Hedgehog

Description: As tall as Sonic but he's light green, sports light blue gloves, light blue shoes, his quills are brushed down like Sonic's, Amber eyes, and a long sword from his dad that he dubbed "Muramasa".

History: Ryu is a hero that trains to be prepared for the worst. He at one time was careless and he lost a friend that way.

He's been serious about the game ever since. He has much experience in fighting and his wind powers are powerful.

He received them after acquiring a certain stone in his early game days. He's been looking for the jerk that deleted his friend in his spare time and he hopes to avenge him one day.

Personality: He's usually easy going but ever since he lost his friend, he's become more distant to other players.

He prefers working alone on quests and he won't tolerate anyone who bad mouths his friends.

Rumor has it that he has another friend on the server but he hasn't talked to her in two years since his old friend was deleted.
111.title: Ryu the hedgehog

choices: A female user busts in  with some interesting news
A male user decides to pick a fight with him
A female user is being hit on by male users
1111.content:
Inside a pub near the item building...

The pub was real noisy as it contained many players who were playing the game.

Everyone was talking about the new game they were playing and how much it has revolutionized the world.

They truly believe this is the ultimate game even though there are more games on the way. One character was not cheerful about the game at all.

He sat in a corner of the pub as he drank his drink. Nobody in the pub dared to approach him in fear they might not live.

After about thirty minutes of sitting in the corner, he was about to leave until...
1111.title: Angry players are not friendly

choices: He arrives to the quest counter
11112.content:
The user was about to leave the pub to a less populated area but a male user who think he's better than him walks up to him and says "What's up with you? This is a called a pub for a reason."

The hedgehog user said nothing and proceeded to the door but the human male user continued to block his way.

The hedgehog user just says "Move aside." in a dark manner. The human male user replies "Ohhhhhh. I'm so scared." in a sarcastic tone and he simply laughs.

The man then says "Don't you know who I am? I'm Draco. One of the most feared users in this game and you are going show me some respect!".

The hedgehog then says "If you're so feared, then how come I've never heard of you?"

Everyone in the pub suddenly stopped at what the hedgehog said and some even took cover as if there was going to be a fight.

The man gets angry and says "You little punk! You better watch what you say if you want stay on this game longer!"

The hedgehog simply attempted to walk past him again and again he blocked the way and said "Where do you think you're going?"

The hedgehog replied "Somewhere you aren't." Half the people in the pub said "OOOOOOOhhhhhhhhh."

then the man obviously was angry and said "You won't be talking so tough when I'm through with you!"

The man equipped his weapons and proceeded to attack the hedgehog male user but in an instant, the battle was over.

The hedgehog user was walking closer to the door as the human male user fell to the ground.

The hedgehog male user says before he leaves "My name is Ryu. Remember it newbie."

The user now identified as Ryu leaves the pub as everyone gathered around the injured Draco.

Ryu was going to head to the quest counter but....
11112.title: A difference in strength

choices: Locate someone and kill a certain monster
Deliver an item and explore an unknown region
111122.content:
Ryu approaches the counter and says "Are there any new quests?" in a bland manner.

The quest organizer just ignores it and says "Yes. There are two quests." Ryu then says "What are they?"

The quest organizer looks at the quest sheet in his computer and says "...".
111122.title: Going on a quest

1111222.content:
Ryu looked at his possible quests that the quest organizer brought up.

He knew that he didn't do a lot of delivery quests but the interesting part about the quest was that the client was unknown.

People normally give their names so that people know how to look for them.

Ryu thought about it and then he looked at the other quest. It was also by an unknown client.

He was starting to interested in the game once again as he was four years ago.

He normally doesn't take quests by unknown clients but today was special. He decided to accept...
1111222.title: Things get interesting

11112221.content:
He went to the desert and stopped at Triet. He looked around and he saw a suspicious person walk into the Triet Inn.

He followed suit and when this person pick out a room, he was going to rent the same room.

He saw the room that was picked. Room 121. The Triet Inn got a touch up from the tales of symphonia game and it really looks like an Inn now.

He entered with the person he tailed and he said "You called for a delivery man?" The figure turned and gasped as Ryu asked the question.

The figure looked at him up and down and the figure said "This is him. He's the one I'm looking for." in a low tone of voice.

Ryu then says "Are you the client who asked for a apple gel to be delivered?" The figure then replies "Yes."

Ryu could make out that it was a woman's voice and that she sounded young. Ryu then says "Who am I to deliver this to?"

The figure then says "You can deliver to an old man living in a house not far from here." Ryu then receives the apple gel and proceeds to the house.

He delivers it and he was about to leave to get his reward but a tall man showed up and asked "Have you seen a red fox-like user around here?"

Ryu simply says "No." He was about to leave but the man persisted "Oh no you don't! You're my only lead to that fox so you will tell me where she is."

Ryu was getting angry because this man was holding him up. Ryu says "Move aside." in a angered manner.

The man then says "Don't make me beat you up! Tell me where she is!" in an enraged tone.

Ryu just draws his sword and the man says "So you won't tell me eh? I'll just beat it out of you then."

The man pulls out a claymore the size of a broadsword. The man flips his hood to reveal he is a black wolf with crimson eyes.

The two engaged in a sword fight in the town.

Ryu goes for an upper cut with his sword but the wolf deflects it and goes for a power swing but Ryu was faster and dodged the attack.

Ryu then engages him in a fencing battle with the wolf winning. Ryu needed to change his strategy otherwise he was going to lose.

He then jumped back and he powered up a wind attack.

He shoots a large gust of wind and knocks the wolf off balance.

He was about to go for the kill but then a mysterious person blocks his sword and says "Now now we can't have any off that Mr. Hedgehog."

Ryu then jumps back and he looks at his situation. A two versus one fight would result in a lot of injures.

Ryu then decided to bypass them and get his client out.

He then charged at them and Ryu did a fake out and used his wind powers to kick up dust to blind them.

While they were getting sand out of their eyes, he jump pasted them and ran into the Inn.

Ryu then went to his room where his client was waiting and he says "We need to go now!"

The client was about ask why he was in a hurry but decided against it and went with him.

They headed to the entrance and opened the map. They saw two locations on the map that they could go to. Ryu decided to head to...
11112221.title: An Interesting day

choices: Defeat a Phoneix and Investigate a castle
Defeat a gang leader and repair a building
111122212.content:
Ryu ran the direction of Pallet town to escape the people chasing him. He arrives at Pallet town and looks at how much its changed.

The town expanded and even more people are living here. Prof. Oak lab was bigger than ever. It had a lot of decorations added to it.

Ryu stops at the new pokemon center that was established there. The center was also as an access point into the game.

Ryu then says "Well that was close." The client simply nods. Ryu then asks "Why were they after you?"

The client then says "What makes you think they're after me?"

Ryu replies "Two things. One you're a suspicious character in a world where people don't judge on looks and second is the little bit of red I saw from your tail when we fled from Triet."

The client simply said nothing because she knew he was right so she ends the charade and removes her cloak.

She's revealed to be a ruby red fox about the height of Shadow with yellow gloves, blue sneakers, and one tail with a heart on the tip.

She then says "I guess you got me. My name is Erika and I've been a user in this game for about seven years." Ryu then flinched at the name.

He remembered that there was someone who had the same user name as her but he figured that it couldn't be her.

She also has been here for the same amount of time as the female user he knew.

He was starting to figure it out until she brought him back to earth with "Hey! What's with that look?"

Ryu shrugs it off and says "Nothing." He then says "I'm about to accept a new quest, would you like to come with me?"

Erika nodded and said "Sure."

Erika has joined Ryu's party.

Ryu approaches the quest counter and says "I need a new quest." The quest organizer says "We have two quest available."

The quest organizer show the two quests...
111122212.title: New party member

1111222121.content:
Ryu looked at the Defeat a phoenix quest and investigate a castle quest.

He remembered that he and his friend from four years ago had gotten a mission just like that.

He remembered the difficulty they had with the phoenix but he was way stronger now than he was before.

He then wonders if its the same phoenix because the quest they got was to get rid of a phoenix one way or another but it was too strong.

In the end, we ran away from it until we finally gave it a more suitable prey and that was that.

Ryu reminisces about that time but once again, Erika brings him back down to Earth with "Are you going to pick a quest or not?"

Ryu then looked at the investigate a castle quest and the description mentioned a new area of the castle the people have never seen before but they fear it to be infested with even stronger monsters so its put on another level.

Ryu looks at the client's name and it says "Marco".

He didn't know anyone by the name of Marco and then he saw the client's name for the phoenix quest and it said "Lily".

He remembered that girl as the one of the first people he met on "Legends of Arcadia". A female user he hasn't seen for about two years.

He would sometimes visit the place she worked but she didn't notice him.

He was wondering what he was going to tell her about his friend because she hadn't gotten the news but he first had to pick a quest and he chose...
1111222121.title: Trip down memory lane

11112221211.content:
Ryu then says "Let's take down a phoenix." Erika likes where he going with this and they depart for the volcano region.

They see the blazing volcano as it erupts every now and then. Ryu saw the target as it was flying over the volcano.

They approached it with caution because they know that a phoenix that's cornered can be very deadly.

Erika then pulled back an arrow and once again Ryu suddenly remembered that his friend used a bow too but she usually prefers laser guns.

Erika shot and the phoenix took damage and Erika says "When I give the signal, you'll get behind it and cut it down."

Ryu nodded and hid behind something as it approached Erika.

Just when the phoenix was about to strike her, she did a triple flip out of its attack range and said "Now!" Ryu jumps behind and strikes its weak point.

It took severe damage and it obviously showed it because it had trouble flying. Ryu and Erika go for the kill and defeat the phoenix with a dual prong assault.

The phoenix didn't survive.

Ryu's party defeated a phoenix.

Received 554 experience points.

Ryu then realized that maybe he can afford to loosen up. Erika was jumping up and down with pure excitement from what we just accomplished.

Erika then asked "What level are you Ryu?" Ryu simply replies "Level 46" Erika jaw dropped after she heard that.

She apparently has never been close to a high level party member. Ryu then asked "What level are you Erika?"

Erika then blushed and said "Promise not to tell anyone?" Ryu then says "Why? Is it embarrassing?"

Erika blushes again and says "Just promise me okay?" Ryu then says "Fine. I promise."

She looks around one more time before saying "Level 10" Now it was Ryu turn to drop his jaw.

He never met a female user that stared death in the face but his friend was like that.

Ryu was starting to see that this was no coincidence. He then said "Did you know that phoenixes and unicorns are used as signs of death and rebirth?"

Erika then said "Of course I knew that Ryu."

Then suddenly she realized why he asked the question because there was only one person she met that asked her that question.

She then asked "Is that you?" Ryu nods and Erika simply gets into one of her "OMG" moments.

Ryu calms her down and she says "Ryu! How have you been? I can't believe that I was standing next to my old friend the whole time! I should tell my friends!"

Ryu simply sighed and Erika then asks "Where's Zack? I want to see how much he has improved!"

Ryu suddenly feels down and says "Zack isn't here anymore." Erika was shocked and asked "Why?"

Ryu then says "He was deleted three years ago. If I wasn't so careless then he'd still be here."

Erika then asks "Can't he make a new account?" Ryu then replies "That's not possible." Erika agains asks "Why?"

Ryu replies again "Ever since he was deleted, he's been in a coma. No one is sure how it happened but after he got deleted, I sent him a message to get a new account but he never returned it. I found out a few days later that he was in a coma but the doctors couldn't tell what the cause was. They're still monitoring his heart rate even now and it all because of that jerk I ran into that day."

Erika then asked "That jerk?"

Ryu then says "Me and Zack were on a quest that involved investigating a new area but anyone who checked it out never came back. We saw this new graveyard region and then suddenly, a user appears out of nowhere almost as if he teleported. Zack was the only one who knew scan at the time so he scan his level and afterwards, he suddenly says "Run Ryu! He'll kill you!" I had no idea what was going on but apparently he was in a whole different class from us. I was only level 15 at the time and Zack was 45. The guy attacked Zack after he said "This guy is too strong for you Ryu! Get out of here and tell everyone what's going on here!" He then clashes with him about three seconds into the match, he deletes him in one move."

As Ryu was beginning again, Erika interrupted him and said "One move!? What level was that guy!?"

Ryu then says "As I was saying, I ran like he told me but it wasn't long before he caught me. He was about to delete me too but then something happened and I was suddenly logged out even though I didn't ask it to log me out but then I realized that if I had stayed, I would have died and I wouldn't be standing here. I have no idea who that guy was but the next time I see him, he's going down." Ryu ends his story as he recalls everything.


Erika was having a hard time believing what happened but if Ryu says it, then it must be true but that means that she lost a friend.

Erika then says "Have you told anyone about this?" Ryu replies "I told the mods and they said they're going to look into it."

Erika then asked "Does Lily know about this?" Ryu replies "No." Erika then says "We should tell her."

Ryu then says "My thoughts exactly." They left the volcano region head to the pub Lily works at which happened to be in Luca which was near the area.

They enter to find that Luca hadn't change much and they saw the person they were looking for.

She was a human with light brown skin, light blue eyes, magneto shoes, and some work clothes you'd only see employees wear.

Ryu then says "Hey!" The human turns around and says "Is that you Ryu? It's been so long! Please have some drinks on the house!"

She sets up a table and they sit down and Lily said "So how has Zack been doing these days?"

Ryu held his head down and said "Yeah. We wanted to talk about that." She was a bit puzzled but listened in...

One past telling later...

Lily was shocked beyond words and if there was something worse than being shocked, then I think she just found it.

Lily then says "I don't believe it. Zack is gone? This can't be." Ryu knew how much in love she was with Zack even though they're Internet buddies.

Lily then says "Could I have sometime to myself?" Ryu simply says "Sure. Come on Erika. We're leaving."

They left so that Lily could be by herself. Ryu was out of the pub before saying "Man. Wish there was a better way to say that."

Erika response was "It couldn't be helped. It just happened. I'm beginning to wonder about this game because I hear rumors of people going into comas and never waking up."

Ryu completes it by saying "Truly a fate worse than death." They leave to the square and Ryu says "Let's do some training."

Erika nods and they enter a teleporter that takes them to....
11112221211.title: Painful memories

111122212112.content:
Ryu and Erika arrived at a beach and saw some giant crabs. Ryu then says "Let's get started."

They approached the crabs and Ryu cuts them down as Erika shoots him with her bow and arrows.

The crabs never stood a chance and even though the crabs were worth less experience, if you kill a whole bunch of them, you can score 1000 exp easy.

That's what Ryu's party was doing.

Ryu's party defeated ten giant crabs.

Received 1224 experience points.

Erika went up 2 levels!

Ryu was resting as he reflected his time in this game.

Erika stopped for a breather and sat next to Ryu and said "What have you been doing for the past three years?"

Ryu simply says "Isolating myself from society. After I lost Zack, I never teamed up with another group ever again."

Erika then says "But you teamed up with me."

Ryu then says "That's because you're my only friend left. If I lost you, I'll lose all the friends I had in the past."

Erika replies "But there's Lily."

Ryu says in a emotionless tone "I've never met her in real life. I don't even know if Lily is a she. I figured I was better off alone but you are the reason I haven't lost to my lonely part. If I hadn't found you again, I probably wouldn't be here right now."

Erika takes his words to heart and says "Even if you change on the outside, I'll still see you as the same carefree Ryu I know."

Ryu just then smiles and says "Thanks."

Erika had rarely seen Ryu smile but the minute she notice, it was gone and Ryu was back to his cold distant self again.

She figured that once this whole craziness was resolved, she was going to leave the gaming world and live a normal life.

Erika then says "You know, I have seen many different kinds of users but I've never met someone like you and I believe I'm glad I met you."

Ryu just looks at her says "Same here."

The two looked like they were in a trance and they leaned into each other and just when they were about to kiss, an explosion occurs.

Ryu goes to investigate. Erika was thinking to herself "Did I almost kiss Ryu? What's wrong with me? We're just friends and nothing more."

She follows after Ryu and it turns out to be a female dog fighting a dragon.

The dog look like a Labrador retriever with lavender fur, white paws, tan ears, and wore a red scarf on her neck.

She was wielding a mage's staff that look like the wizard's staff from final fantasy IX.

She appeared to be having trouble with the dragon and Ryu said "Do you need some help?"

The dog throws a blizzara at the fire-breathing dragon and she looks Ryu's way.

She looked like she was about to say no but she reconsidered and said "Sure."

Ryu jumped in and cut the dragon down but it got back up and Erika shot an arrow at it but it did little damage.

The Labrador retriever throws another blizzara and the dragon tries to get up again.

Ryu jumped into the sky and plunged his sword into it necks and thus ended the battle.

Ryu's party slayed a dragon!

Received 3047 experience points.

Erika went 5 levels!

The Labrador retriever went up 3 levels!

Ryu went up 1 level!

Ryu then asked "What's a mage doing out here by herself?" The mage simply said "Simple. I was out here training."

Ryu replies "You could have gotten yourself deleted if we hadn't shown up." the mage then says "I know. I really should be more careful."

Erika and says "What's your name?" the mage says "My username is lightningspear but you can call me Sakura."

Ryu then says "All right Sakura, you seem pretty strong with that magic you had."

Sakura then says "I made sure I could handle the more powerful magic." Ryu asks "We could use a mage, would you like to join us?"

Erika then says "Wait! Ryu can I talk to you in private?"

They wander off into a random part of the woods and Erika says "Are you sure we should let this girl on our team? I mean we just met her."

Ryu replies "Yes but she's strong when it comes to magic and besides, There are enemies that require magic to effectively defeat."

Erika counters with "But we don't know if this girl is a jerk or something." Ryu then suddenly says "Are you jealous?"

Erika blushes and says "No! What would give you that idea!?" Ryu then says "Listen, I think we can trust her so I say we should let her on the team."

Ryu walks away from a speechless Erika and they head back to Sakura and Ryu asks "Well, do you want in?"

Sakura thinks about it and says "Ok. I'll do it." Ryu then says "Good. I guess that means we're party members now."

Ryu tries to get Erika and Saura to shake hands. Sakura held out her hand and Erika was hesitant at first, but she shook her hand.

Ryu then says "Well, it's getting late so we'll go on a quest tomorrow?" Sakura shakes her head but Erika says "I can't."

Ryu asks "Why not?" Erika says "I need to take care of something but I'll be on around 6 p.m." Ryu then says "Cool. See you then."

Ryu logs out and just when Sakura was about to log out, Erika then says "Just to let you know, Ryu may trust you but I don't so don't think you can make moves on him when I'm not looking."

She then logs out leaving a confused Sakura in the forest.
111122212112.title: The power of the mage

1111222121121.content:
Ryu logging in...

Ryu appeared at transverse town. It was a link to most of the areas in the game but some required you to go to a specific server to get to your destination.

Ryu saw Sakura log in and he said "Hey Sakura." Sakura turned to him as she logged in and said "Hey Ryu."

Ryu then said "Ready to check out a new location I found while I was by myself?" Sakura was confused at this.

She thought that he traveled with that other female user everywhere. She then asked "What kind of place?"

Ryu then simply said "I'm afraid that you are going to have to close your eyes." Sakura then said "How do I know your telling me the truth?"

Ryu replies "I don't lie to any friends I meet unless its necessary." Sakura then thought about how honest he's been and said "Okay."

She closed her eyes and Ryu began typing a code into his menu.

They suddenly teleport and leave transverse town.

Just as they left, A familiar user shows up and says "Hey. Where's Ryu? He said he was going to meet me here."

Meanwhile...

Ryu's party went to a lake that once had a unicorn at it and that lake was known as Lake Umacy.

Ryu then said "You can open your eyes now." Sakura opened her eyes and saw the most beautiful sunrise you could ever see.

She then asked "How do you know about this place?"

Ryu simply said "I once discover this place by accident back when I had a new account. I was standing right here when I woke up this early in the morning. This is the only time you can catch this beautiful sunrise. I was going to bring Erika along but she usually takes so long that I rarely get to show her."

Sakura then said "Man. She sure was missing out on something amazing wasn't she?" Ryu replied "Yeah."


As they look at the sunrise, they are holding hands. Ryu suddenly realizes this but waits for Sakura to notice too.

She was memorized by the sunrise. She then turned to him as if expecting a kiss and Ryu then says "Um. You know. We are holding hands."

Sakura then realized what she was doing and separated herself from him and blushed as she said "Sorry."

Ryu then said "We should head back so we don't keep Erika waiting." Sakura nodded but then someone said "Hold it!"

Ryu then pulls out his sword and Sakura points her staff and the mysterious person is revealed to be...
1111222121121.title: Romantic Sunrise

11112221211211.content:
A bandit with his friends then appear and said "What do we have here? Two people that look like they have money. I'm going to make this simple for you. Hand over your money and we'll let you leave in one piece."

Ryu then says "Yeah right. Let me give you a better deal. You guys walk away now and we won't have to delete your sorry butts."

The leader of the bandit gang gets angry and says "So that's how you want to play it huh. We'll show you! Attack my men!"

They suddenly move at an incredible speed and attack swiftly but Ryu kept blocking their attacks while Sakura provided support fire.

But Ryu couldn't block them all for long and one of them slipped by and grabbed Sakura when she wasn't looking.

Ryu then said "Hey! Let her go!" The leader then says 'Sure. We'll let her go but only if you take her place for deletion."

Ryu got angry at himself for biting off more than he could chew.

Just as he about to give up, a blue blur comes out of nowhere and attacks the bandit holding Sakura and saves her.

The leader got a good look at him and said "Oh no. It's you!" the person standing before the leader was none other than Sonic the hedgehog.

Sonic then said "I suggest you guys beat it if you know what's good for you."

The leader of the bandits stood firmly on his feet but his men were running around in circles.

He then said "We'll finish this later hedgehog but just so you don't forget me, my name is Larry the chipmunk."

The coat wearing chipmunk retreated as his men followed. Ryu then says "Thanks for the help Sonic."

Sonic replies "No problem. Just helping out fellow users. If you ever need me, just use my special whistle."

Sonic then whistled as if he was whistling "Live and Learn". Ryu easily got the hang of it.

Ryu learned the "Live and learn" whistle song! Now you can call sonic the hedgehog into battle by simply whistling the tune!

Sakura then asked "Could you teach me a few techniques?"

Sonic then said "Okay. First I'm going to teach you how to control the wind and turn it into projectile attack all it requires is a little bit of energy."

Sonic then showed her the basics and she got it in two tries.

Sakura can use wind magic now! The power of the wind is in your hands!

Sakura learned Aero!

Sonic then says "You'll slowly develop it further but you'll get the hang of it later so see ya!" And he disappeared in a blue blur once again.

Ryu then realizes "Oh crap! We left Erika alone!" Sakura realizes the same thing and says "We need to get going!"

They hurried back to their meeting to see a pissed off Erika and they explained what happened but they made sure not to mention the holding hands part.

Erika then said "Well I'm glad you guys are alright. So where should we head?" Ryu thought about and said "Let's do another quest."

They head to a quest counter and once again, there are only two quests available. Ryu looks carefully at the quests and chooses...
11112221211211.title: The appearance of a renowned hero

111122212112112.content:
Ryu looked at the client name and thought (Unknown name huh? This person must be important if they won't give their name.)

Erika then said "Man! I'm so excited! Let's go!" She then went to the teleporter and Sakura asked "Is she always like that?"

Ryu replied "No. She's usually more excited than this." They leave for their destination.

On sailor's Island....

Ryu and his friends showed up in another location. Ryu then said "This is sailor island." They looked at the pub and it looked bigger than it was before.

They went into the pub and saw people from all over. Sakura then said "We should get a ship. We'll need to sail the skies." Erika then asked "Excuse me. Do you have a ship?"

The young man in the chair turned to her and said "Hello there. You're looking for a ship? You've asked the right person!"

The man stood up and said "My name is Luke. Pleased to meet you." Erika was blushing a little from Luke's politeness and said "Oh my."

Sakura simply thought (But I thought you liked Ryu!) Luke then said "So you need a ship? I have one. I call it the Braver."

Ryu then asked "Is the name suppose to sound heroic?" Luke replied "But of course! This ship has been with me since I bought it ten years ago."

Ryu then said "We need to go somewhere." Luke then said "Of course I'll take you to wherever you need to go." Sakura then said "Okay then. Let's go!"

Luke then said "Wait! You ladies may come with me but the gentleman stays here." Ryu then asked "What!? Why!?"

Luke replied "All the clients I've had to this point have been women. I don't plan on making an exception."

Ryu got angry and said "So this is how it's going to be. Fine! I'll find my own way!" Ryu then ran out. Sakura then said "Wait!"

By the time she said this, Ryu was already gone. Luke then asked "What's up with him?"

Sakura then said "If Ryu isn't coming along, I'm not coming either!" Sakura ran after Ryu.

Erika wasn't sure what to do. The man was real nice to her but he said that Ryu couldn't come along. Erika then said "You're a nice guy but I'm going after Ryu!"

Erika about to leave but then she felt something hit her on her neck and she was unconscious.

Meanwhile...

Ryu was running through the city thinking (Damn it! I should have known that was going to happen! I'll need to find someone else!)

Ryu accidentally ran into someone and Ryu said "Sorry." Just as Ryu got a look at who he ran into, his face went white and he said "You're..."
111122212112112.title: Men with Principals

choices: A man carrying a bag out of the pub.
A suspicious man shows up with something to say.
1111222121121122.content:
Vyse stood up wearing his trademark Blue rogue clothes and eye patch. He then said "It's okay. I wasn't looking where I was going." Ryu then said "You're Vyse!"

Vyse scratched the back of his head and said "Yep. That's me." Ryu then asked "Could you help me?" Vyse then replied "Of course! I'll help anyone who needs transportation!"

Ryu then asked "How did you know that I needed transportation!?" Vyse replied "I can tell a lot about someone from just looking into their eyes. You met Luke didn't you?"

Ryu then said "Wait! You know him!?"

Vyse then said "He came about when the need for transport ships came about. The guy has been known to transport any girl who asks for his services. He's never once taken a guy."

Ryu thought about the significant of what Vyse was saying. Vyse then said "He's a man of his word. When he says he never makes an exception he means it."

Ryu then asked "So you'll take me to my destination?" Vyse smirked and said "Depends on the location. The more dangerous it is, the more interested I'll be."

Ryu then told him about the quest he accepted and Vyse says "Okay. So you're transporting a messenger to another country. But the black pirates might be a problem?"

Ryu nodded and Vyse said "Okay then. We'll take it. My ship is outside. Let me know when you're ready to leave." Vyse then walked back to his ship.

Ryu then thought about his day. He met the fastest thing alive hours ago and now he meets the greatest pirate ever!

Ryu felt he could die happy then but then Sakura said "Ryu wait!" Ryu saw Sakura and Ryu asked "Why are you here? Weren't you going to the meeting place with Luke?"

Sakura then replied "I don't care if I get there! Not without you!" Ryu suddenly felt touched that she cared but then asked "Where's Erika?"

Sakura replied "I think she stayed behind." Ryu then said "That's strange. Erika isn't known to leave me alone like this." Sakura then said "There's a first time for everything."

Ryu thought about and something caught his eye. He saw....
1111222121121122.title: Vyse the legendary air pirate

choices: The ship goes to the Dark Rift
11112221211211221.content:
Ryu saw Luke leaving with a bag. Vyse then says "That's strange. I don't remember him going into the pub with a bag before and Polly doesn't have bags."

Sakura then said "I have a bad feeling about this." Ryu then says "Me too. Let's follow him." Ryu runs close enough to not be seen but not to far away that he can't keep track of him.

Ryu sees Luke ride off on his ship and Ryu asks "Why is he leaving? Erika hasn't gotten on the ship yet." Sakura then says "Maybe she's at the pub?"

Vyse checked the pub, then came back and said "Everyone in the pub says they didn't see the girl you described leave the pub!"

Ryu then says "I get the feeling Luke has something to do with that. We should track him down." Ryu and Sakura got on the Vyse's ship. The ship was quite big.

It had the blue rogue symbol on it. The symbol was even on the sails. The ship was made of a sturdy wood. Aika and Fina come up to the deck and Fina asks "Where to captain?"

Vyse replies "We're following a suspicious ship. Luke's ship." Aika smirks and asks "So we finally get to confirm the rumors?" Ryu then asks "What rumors?"

Vyse then says "Rumor has it that certain clients that go with Luke disappear and Luke's reply to that was "I failed my client." They couldn't figure out where they went."

Ryu then says "Let me guess. Luke's probably lying about that." Sakura then says "I won't forgive him if he hurts Erika!" Fina then says "Don't worry. We'll get your friend back."

Vyse then says "Okay. Follow that ship! Release the sails!" The ship began to move and it followed after Luke's ship...
11112221211211221.title: Rumors about the Reliable Luke

choices: Aika and Fina fight some monsters
111122212112112211.content:
Vyse kept a steady course as they followed Luke's ship. They eventually reach a strange portal and Luke enters. Ryu then says "What the!? How did he get into the Dark Rift!?"

Vyse then says "I don't know but he must have parts that get past the Dark Rift's winds." Sakura then asks "What's the story behind this place?"

Aika replies "The story is that when a ship goes in there, they never come out. Some ships are destroyed by the sheer winds in the Rift and others are lost for eternity."

Sakura then says "That's sounds like a scary place." Fina then says "True. But we've gotten through it before." Sakura was surprised and said "You got through this place!?"

Ryu then says "Of course they did. Did you ever play their games?" Sakura then says "No." Vyse then says "Anyways, this appears to be our only option."

They went into the abyss known as the Dark Rift.

3 hours later....

Ryu still sees Luke's ship and says "How long does he plan to sail in this rift?" Vyse then says "This is strange. He hasn't gone in a specific rift. He just keeps moving."

Ryu thinks about and asks "Where are the girls?" Vyse replies "They're in the lower decks sleeping." Ryu thinks about it and says "Okay." They followed him for another hour.

Ryu then finally says "Now I know there's something wrong." Vyse then says "This is unlike Luke. He doesn't go in random directions."

Ryu then realizes something and says "The girls!" Vyse then says "Wait! You mean he knows we're following him!?" Ryu then says "If we think of it that way, it makes sense!"

Vyse then says "Crap! Ryu! Check the lower decks! I'll check the upper decks!" Vyse stopped the ship and ran to the upper decks.

Ryu to the lower deck to see if the girls were down there. Ryu got to the lower decks to find....
111122212112112211.title: Could this be a trap?

1111222121121122111.content:
Sakura was blasting some strange looking men with fira and blizzara spells. Sakura was running out of magic and one of the men got past her barrage of firas and blizzaras.

Sakura then thought at that moment (Damn it! To be defeated because of sheer numbers.) Suddenly, the man fell to the ground and Ryu was standing in his place.

Sakura felt really happy at that moment and said "Ryu!" Ryu then cuts down some more strange men and eventually defeats them. Ryu then asks "Who were those guys?"

Sakura then says "That's what I want to know. They came out of nowhere. Aika and Fina went to the upper decks to see if there were more but then these guys showed up."

Ryu then says "Waiting until you were alone? How low can these guys get!?" Sakura then says "There were too many for me to handle by myself. I'm glad you showed up."

Ryu then sees a strange logo and asks "What's with this logo?" Sakura looks at it and says "I recognize that logo! This is Luke's emblem!"

Ryu then says "So there's something strange about Luke after all. The real question is why is he doing this?" Sakura then says "I don't know but he will pay for this!"

Ryu and Sakura went to the upper decks and found Vyse with Aika and Fina. Ryu then asks "They attacked up here too?" Vyse replies "Yeah. I shouldn't have let my guard down."

Aika then says "But now we know that Luke most definitely has something to do with this!" Sakura then asks "So where is he now?" Ryu saw Luke's ship and said "There it is!"

Vyse gets to the front of the ship and steers them toward the ship. Ryu then says "I'll check it out. You guys wait here." Ryu jumped onto Luke's ship and went inside.

Sakura thought to herself (Please be careful.) Vyse then says "I'll make sure the enemy doesn't get the drop on us again." Vyse went to another part of the ship.

Meanwhile...

Ryu looked around the strange looking ship. He saw pictures of items and weapons. He looked at some of the cases in the room and saw some rare artifacts.

Ryu then asks himself "Was this guy a lover of art or something?" Ryu walked into the main room where it had pictures of Luke and pictures of girls.

Ryu got to his desk and pulled out a file. He then read it and said "This file is a record log." Ryu looked at it with precision.

August 31, 198X

I am unstoppable. I've cut down so many enemies and I feel like nothing could defeat someone like me.

I never knew taking on pirates could be exciting. I defeated many of my enemies until I ran into a woman.

She was a part of a pirate crew I defeated and we were wondering what to do with her.

My men suggested raping her but I'm a man of courtesy I would never rape someone. I told my men that was out of the question.

They didn't take it too well but then the woman asked if she can join my crew. Turns out, she was only on the pirate crew she was on because of money.

She owed the captain money but she couldn't pay it back so he had her work it off. She was actually glad we defeated him.

The captain mistreated her in many ways. He even almost raped her at one point. I felt like I would be doing her a favor by having her join my crew.

November 4, 198X

I've become attached to the woman named Violet. She did so much for my crew. She was a valuable asset and helped with taking care of the ship.

I think that's when I fell for her. She was very pretty and I couldn't keep my eyes off her. She apparently had the same feelings for me.

We truly connected today. I wanted to take her out on a date when my adventuring was over.

I'm not sure why but my men have been more distant with me. Are they jealous?

March 18, 199X

I don't know why my men betrayed me but I should have seen it coming. They plotted a mutiny against me and left me to die on a barren island.

I eventually escaped and went to look for those traitors. They had Violet with them so they were definitely not going to be forgiven.

I found the ship but it was torn up. I checked everything and it turns out that someone attacked them a while after they left the previous town.

I couldn't find Violet's body among them but then I found a letter that was amazingly not burnt. I read the letter and it was from Violet.

She escaped my crew but then Valua stepped in and shot down the ship. They checked for survivors and found her. She had enough time to let me know she was alive.

She also said that I should stop Valua. They have become corrupt but I couldn't do anything about it. I decided to wait for an opportunity to get into Valua.

I had no idea that something would take place there one year later.

April 25, 199X

I just heard that Valua has fallen. I couldn't believe what I was hearing. Turns out that Vyse the blue rogue trashed them. A lot happened and Valua was destroyed.

I received a letter from Violet today saying that she somehow escaped Valua while Vyse was causing a ruckus. She was now sailing around looking for me.

I decided to find her and got together a new crew. One that would help me on my search. I sailed around for a while until I received a letter again.

This time, it was from someone I didn't know. He told me to do what he says otherwise Violet dies. I couldn't believe this guy was making me do things for him!

I couldn't argue because he had Violet so I did whatever he said.

June 15, 20XX

I've been in the transport business for more than ten years and yet this guy still refuses to give Violet back. I won't forgive him if he hurts her!

He mentioned that he had an important job for me but it was to commence 5 years from now.

I have no idea what it was about but I just did what I was told. It felt like an eternity since I last saw her. I don't plan to let this guy get away with this!



Ryu turned to the next page but it was ripped out. Ryu then says "Why is this entry ripped out?"

Ryu tried to find out more but suddenly, a voice says "Looks like you found out too much." Ryu looks around and sees no one around.

The voice then says "Sorry. I can't let you leave so prepare for deletion!" Ryu then saw a bomb appear in the corner and said "Crap!" Ryu ran out as fast as he could.

Just as Ryu made it to the deck, the ship exploded and Ryu wasn't sure if he was going to make the jump. He jumped with all his might as the ship behind him exploded.
1111222121121122111.title: A log entry and explosions!

11112221211211221112.content:
Ryu jumped with all his might but he missed and fell into the never ending sky below.

Ryu was thinking about how painful this fall would be but then he remembered that the bottom was a long way down. He wouldn't hit the bottom for a while.

Even if he survived, he would have a hard time getting back into normal skies. Ryu then saw a small piece of land and changed his trajectory to land on it.

Ryu was glad that he learned some tricks from Sonic. Ryu then pondered how he was going to get out of this. He check to see if he could log out but he couldn't due to interference.

Ryu didn't see any air ships nearby so he was pretty much stuck. He wasn't sure what he was going to do but suddenly, he asked himself "I wonder how Erika is doing?"

Ryu looked up at the stormy skies as he waited in the rift.

Character change

Erika was waking up in a strange room. She looked around and saw some pictures of a unusual girl. Erika then said "Who is this?" Then a voice says "That's Violet."

Erika looked at the figure that just appeared and said "You're that jerk who kidnapped me!" Luke then walked up to her and said "Please understand. I didn't want to do this."

Erika then says "Give me one reason why I should believe what you say!" Luke then says "I was trying to find a friend but I ended up finding out that she was kidnapped."

Erika then said in a calmer voice "Friend? You mean Violet?" Luke then said "Yeah. They threaten to kill her if I don't do what they say." Erika then asks "Do you know where she is?"

Luke replies "No. And that makes it harder on me. I don't know if they really have her but I can't take the chance if they do have her." Erika then says "You don't want her to die."

Luke then says "But I promise that once Violet is in my hands again, those guys will pay!" Erika then started to think that maybe this guy might need help.

Luke then says "I don't know what to do! I want to stop this! This is giving me a bad name but Violet means so much to me!" Erika could hear the desperation in his voice.

Luke then started shedding tears and saying " All I want to sail with Violet again! Is that so wrong?" Erika then thought (Ryu would help him if he heard this story.)

Erika then asked "Why are you telling me this?" Luke then says "I just wanted to tell someone. Do you have any idea what its like to keep something like this bottled up?"

Erika then said "I'll help you." Luke stopped crying for a moment and said "What?" Erika then says "It's starting to become weird watching my captor cry."

Luke then says "Really? You mean you'll help me?" Erika then says "Rule number 5 of being a hero! Help those less fortunate than yourself!"

Luke then said in a teary tone "Thank you!" Erika then says "Save the waterworks for your friend!" Luke wipes away the tears and says "Okay."

Luke has joined the party!

Luke is a human with light brown skin, spiky brown hair, blue eyes, and had some muscle behind him. He is wearing a light blue pirate vest with matching pants and brown boots.

He also carries a cutlass equipped with a blue moonstone giving it water and wind abilities. The blade was sharpen to boost effectiveness.

Erika then asks "So where are we?" Luke replies "We're in the Dark Rift. We're pretty much near the entrance. I needed to lose a certain someone." Erika then asks "Who is that?"

Luke then says "I'll tell you later. Let's head to our real destination." Luke then turned the ship to the swirling portal of the Dark Rift.

Luke then says "Okay. The meeting place is Nasr. We're going to meet a man wearing a red turban." Erika then asks "So what are you going to do?"

Luke replies "I'm going to show up and mention the code word. He'll come to the ship and see you tied up. He's suppose to take me to Violet."

Erika then says "So in case he tries to double-cross you, you'll loosen the bonds on me." Luke then said "Yeah. I just hope he doesn't notice."

Erika then says "I just hope your friend is all right." Luke then says "Yeah. I hope she's okay too." Luke arrives in the docks of Nasr as he says this.
11112221211211221112.title: Ryu's epic fail and Erika's time to shine!

111122212112112211122.content:
Luke walks through town as he looks for the man with the red turban. He sees him and walks up to him. Luke then says without looking directly at him "The time to play has come."

The red turban man replies "but the sun isn't out yet." Luke then says "Then the moon shall greet us." The red turban then says "So you're my contact?"

Luke nods and the red turban man then says "Excellent. I will now follow you to be sure you have what my master asks." Luke then takes the red turban man to his ship.

Meanwhile...

Erika was trying her best to look helpless but it was hard when you know you're bonds are loose. Erika then hears the door and Luke walks in.

The red turban man follows and says "Excellent. This girl is just what my master asked for." Luke then says "I'm not handing her over until I see Violet!"

The red turban man then says "Don't worry. I won't trouble you. I'll take you to her." The red turban man then took the wheel and sailed to a distant island.

The red turban man then lands and takes them to the maroon isle. Luke then walks into the building and the red turban man follows.

The red turban man then shows Luke a secret panel to a secret room. Luke then sees a fox with violet colors, with a white tail tip and chest.

She was wearing a blue blouse with red jeans. She also had red gloves, light green shoes, light blue eyes, and had one tail. She was about shadow's height and she was tied up.

Luke then says "Violet!" Luke ran up to her and untied her. Violet was crying tears of joy with being reunited with Luke.

The red turban man took advantage of the touching moment and went to where Erika is. The red turban man then approaches her but Erika manages to get a surprise attack on him.

The red turban man then removes his clothes to reveal a black wolf with a bushy white tail. He also had white paws and feet. He also had red eyes but he was taller than Vyse.

Erika then asks "What do you want with me?" The wolf then says "Sorry. I believe I saw this coming so I had a backup plan."

Erika was about to say something but the wolf knocked her out. Luke and Violet make it to the cell room just as the wolf jumped out the window into a small boat he had.

The wolf flew off with the unconscious Erika. Luke then hits the wall because he wasn't able to save both of them.

Violet then says "Don't worry. We'll help her just as she helped me." Luke then says "Yeah. I owe her for this." Luke then turns the ship in the direction the small ship was heading.

Violet then said "It's time for Luke the blue rogue to rise again!" Luke nodded as he recalled his name from the past. He felt like he was reliving those ancient memories.

They ended up heading through the south ocean to head to Ixa'taka.
111122212112112211122.title: The failed plan and the promise to a friend.

1111222121121122111222.content:
Sakura was trying hard to remain strong as Vyse and the others continued to search for Ryu. Vyse tried going low but couldn't get past some of the more dense clouds.

Vyse then says "This isn't helping. We need to look lower." Aika then says "But the clouds won't let us through."

Vyse then thought on it as Sakura was praying that Ryu was okay.

Meanwhile...

Ryu was lying down as he remembered the mission they were sent on. He couldn't believe they got sidetracked like this. Ryu then noticed a ship coming to his location.

Ryu wasn't sure what to make of it until someone came out and said "What are you doing here?"

Ryu saw that the fox was about as tall as Vyse and had some blades on his sides. He also was brown with a bit of blue and had two tails. Ryu then replies "I was blown off a ship."

The fox then says "Then that means you're stuck here." Ryu then says "Pretty much." The fox then says "Okay then. I'll get you out of here."

Ryu then asks "Is that really okay?" The fox replies "Of course it is! I was just going to leave this rift myself." Ryu then gets on his ship and sees that its made of a strong wood.

It also had some strong materials used for it's sails. Ryu then asks "What's your name?" The fox replies "The name is Justin but I doubt we'll meet again."

Justin then had the ship surface past the powerful currents as they got inside to prevent from getting caught in the strong winds.

Back at Vyse's ship...

Vyse then says "It's no good. We can't get past these strong currents. We'll have to find another way down." Sakura was about to lose hope when a ship came up from the bottom.

The ship stopped at the altitude Vyse was at. Vyse then said "How did that ship get past the currents!?" Then a voice says "That's because this is no ordinary ship."

Justin then came out with Ryu as he said "Did you lose something?" Ryu jumped onto the ship as Sakura said "Ryu! I was so worried!"

Sakura just hugged him as Ryu comforted her. Justin then asks "Are you guys looking for someone?" Vyse then replies "We were but you found him first so thanks."

Justin then says "I don't need thanks. I was planning on leaving anyways. Nothing interesting here."

Justin then takes off as he says to Ryu "Don't go fall down in the dark rift again you hear?" Ryu then says to himself "It's not like I wanted to fall."

Vyse then says "But if that ship was a trap, then where is luke hiding?" Fina then says "Maybe outside?" Ryu then says "Only one way to find out!"

They head back to the entrance to the dark rift as they look for Luke. Vyse then says "He's not here. We'll have to call it a day."

Sakura then says "But we haven't found Erika yet!" Ryu then says "But we're tired. If we try searching now, we could easily be ambushed. Try to understand our situation."

Sakura then calmed down a little after hearing that. Vyse then says "So continue the search tomorrow?" Ryu then says "Yeah and next time, we'll find her!"

They headed to Esparanza to rest. Ryu then went to the hub to log out and Sakura says "Ryu. Let's find her tomorrow." Ryu smirks then says "You can bet on that!"

Ryu and Sakura left as their thoughts were on finding Erika.
1111222121121122111222.title: The desperate search and helping those in need

112.content:
name: kemada
description: white as snow, with eyes the couler of amber, looks like a elegante version of a snowy fox. tall and thin with silver teeth and claws
she carries a long bow with quils for arrows. she is a private player, who lives in secret.
personality: quiet but strong, she will play till the end. she searches for her little lost brother, who one day ran out chasing a blue butterfly and was said to have been deleted.
she has one friend, a large creature. that lookes like a cross between a rabbit and a dragon, it is black like the darkist hours of the night, with silver eyes like two glittering stars.

i hope she is something like what your searching for, please write to me and say if it is or is not.
can u explain a little more about the plot of the story

bella x
112.title: (Select Character)

12.content: You're in space now. You should get going!
12.title: Corneria (Lylat system from Star Fox)

choices: Wake up to your alarm clock going off
shoot your alarm clock and go back to bed
121.content:
Mave Hendryx

Age: 23

Species: Monga'se

Appearance: Mave's got pink skin, and mongoose shaped ears and tail that match her shoulder length blond hair. Her eyes are dark red with light slivers of blood red in them. She wears a black skin tight vest and matching shorts along with fingerless gloves and biker boots and a white headband and a huge gun she calls Gregory.

Personality: Mave's a bit high strung. She's got a bad temper and tends to stay away from groups, usually keeping to her one man space ship. She's a space pirate and a darn good one at that but she's been a bit down on her luck lately, which has made her even more irritable. Attracted to bad luck and danger, she tends to get herself into a pickle more often then not. Is currently looking for a big hall she can retire off of.
121.title: Mave Hendryx

choices: Your ships faster than his- you're out'a here!
1212.content:
Mave curled up against the delicious looking man in her dream only to have their kiss interupted by an ungodly aweful sound that began screetching through his mouth as soon as he opened it to whisper sweet somethings into her ear. She groaned in anger and frustration as she opened her eyes to find herself back in her cramped little sleeping quarters with her alarm clock going off in her ear. "Alarm- off." she moaned, rolling back over in hopes of continuing where she left off in her dream. Yet for some reason instead of the alarm going back to sleep like she was wanting to do it kept buzzing in her ear.

"Alarm- off" she growled much more forcefully. The little bugger still made an annoyingly cute and perky beeping sound in her ear. Had she been that stupid- to turn the alarm on that setting? What had been so important about getting up this early in the first place? "Alarm off!" she yelled. It didn't work. Mave felt her eyebrow twitch as she pulled out her pistol and shot the stupid clock. She opened one eye to see that she had in fact set the alarm to keep going till she'd gotten up to turn it off manually. "I'll just buy another one." she told herself as she rolled back over and curled back up into her sheets. Moments later she was back to that dream again. She let out a sigh of relief as she rested her head on the big guys arm... then a bunch of cops sped past them in the park and a news ship flew overhead. "Darn it all!" Mave yelled as she hopped up and began running from the cops. She bolted for her ship. If she got into it she could outrun anyone. Why there were giant bubbles that were making it hard for her to run was beyond her- call it dream sense but she ended up rolling out of bed as her alarm went off yet again. "Dog on it all.... Alarm-" It wasn't until she opened her eyes to the red flashing light that she realized it wasn't her alarm. There wasn't anything left of that. It was the ship.

"Detecting space craft less than 12 leagues away." the ship kept repeating. Mave scrambled to her feet, opening her door and running to her seat, hopping into it.

"Has the ship tried to communicate yet?" she asked as she punched in a number of commands into the controls.

"Affrimative."

"Currently?" she questioned.

"Affirmative."

"Open a connection." she ordered. A second later the screen in front of her came to life revealing a face she really didn't want to see. "Oh... its you."

"Mave, my sweet little blossm of sunlight..." the captain offered.

"Get a grip..." Mave mumbled as she rolled her eyes. "What do you want?"

"Why, I merely want to disguss something with you aboard my ship." he offered with a 'charming smile'.

"I'm a pirate and you're a captain... the guy who's supposed to catch me. How dumb do you think I am?" she asked.

He smirked. "I assure you sweet lady, i will not arrest you without giving you giving you a warning. It isn't my will to cage such a beauty as you but I do need to speak with you, if you please. Its of the ut-most importance." Mave started her engines as he spoke. She wasn't about to listen to this guy. "And my dear, if you try to run I'll be forced to capture you. Right now I'm of the peaceful mind. Don't make me change that by running. I don't like it when they run. It's annoying."
1212.title: shoot your alarm clock and go back to bed

choices: Have tea with the laidies and flirt with them all morning
listen to your 2nd in command tell you what you need to do
fummble with a loose button on your jacket
122.content:
Name: Captain Drixiel Maxinium aka: Drix

age:25

appearance: Drix isn't anywhere wanting in looks. He's the ultimate ladies man and he knows it. He's currently got black hair, blue eyes, and a tan to go with his perfect build but he tends to change his looks depending on the woman he's going after. He's always wearing his captains uniform- a knee length jacket, pants, gloves, and knee high boots. His fleet consists of nearly all women except for his second in command. He's in charge of keeping the peace in space and loves hunting down criminals. He's got two tattoo's he keeps hidden. One on his left arm and another on his right bicept.

Personality: Drix has always managed to get what he wanted by using his good looks and charm to make the ladies swoon over him. He really does have the whole package, good looks, manners, intelligence... but he just won't take no for an answer which means he'll go overboard to get what he wants if he's refused. Once his mind is set there's no stopping him.
122.title: Captain Dixiel Maxinium

choices: Take some initiative and look for your next case
Press the red button you've been dying to press for the last 6 years
123.content:
Sorrel S Tressium

Age:22

race: human

Appearance: Bright red hair and dark green eyes. He wears a black tank top and pants along with a silver belt, and gloves. His ears are pierced about five different times- one for every time he got drunk and decided to go out and do something. He's got quite a few scars and a tribal tattoo winding up his left arm.

Personality:Being a bounty hunter doesn't mean life cant be fun- that's Sorrel's modo and its one of the only things he takes very seriously- making him a not very serious person until it comes to getting the bad guy and getting paid. He's a bit of a mischief maker and he's always giving his gorgeous partner a hard time.

Wake up and remind your partner to fix his gun
124.content:
Mina "Minx" Nekosai

Age:22

Race: Cat/human hybrid

Appearance: Long dark blue hair, bright green cat eyes, and tan skin with a curvy build. She wears a red choker with a bell on it. Has cat ears and a tail. Wears a black tank top and black leggings with a black skirt. Also wears steel toed boots, fingerless gloves, and a white button up shirt with ruffles she keeps unbuttoned.

Personality: Is very sweet but has a hard time keeping her partner, Sorrel, out of trouble. Is part of a two man ship/ bounty hunting business. She's a get the job done right kind of girl and is a hard worker. Has to juggle her partner flirting with her, keeping the business afloat while keeping them fed, catching bad guys, and keeping her partner focussed on something that doesn't have to do with having fun. Busy life but someone's got to do it.
124.title: Mina Nekosai

choices: You go and wake your partner up and tell him what to do for the morning
You go and order some food and then walk outside and look at the sun.
1241.content: Mina was sleeping peacefuly since the sun even came up. she knew she needed to get up so she opened her still tired eyes and looked out the window. "here we go.." she mumbled to her self and then walked out her bed and into the shower. she smiled softly as the warm water hits her skin. it was refreshing for her. even though some people thought it was werid for her to like water. but she did. she got out the shower and got into her clouthes. once she had everthing on she grabed her equiment and walked out the room.
1241.title: Wake up and take a shower

13.content: You're on a crossover planet. You need a destination right now!
13.title: Mobius (Crossover with Earth in Sonic Adventure)

134.content: Please pick a weapon to fight with!
134.title: Pick a weapon

15.content: Here are the last starting locations so choose.
15.title: Expansion

151.content: Here is the site of Mario's road to fame. Choose a character name.
151.title: Mushroom kingdom (Mario world)

152.content: This location is part of a game people thought wouldn't do well at first. Choose a name.
152.title: Tranverse town (from kingdom hearts)

153.content: This location is part of a game that was very popular back in the day. Choose a character.
153.title: ACDC Town (from megaman battle network games)

154.content: The home of the most unexpected ninja has a place in this game. Choose a character.
154.title: Konoha (from naruto)

info.brief_description: A virtual world where you have journeys of action, adventure, and maybe even romance.
info.description:
The name is based off of "Skies of Arcadia". It's a virtual reality game where you put your character through hardships.

I'm currently only going to have three starting cities because I'm low on names so if you can come up with a name, I'll let you write your character's story.

You choose his/her age, gender, name, personality, and of course description. You will decide whether the character prevails or fails.

You decide if that person is good or evil. I'll try and include as many people as possible but I need ideas! Your journey now begins!

Also, new thing I'm adding based on other stories like this one I'm making.

I'm allowing hero characters and villains that you can team up with to make your adventure more exciting.

I expect plenty of cameo appearances in your stories! You can also create a party if you think you got a good story for them.

If you'd like your character to appear in my story, Just send me a review stating who it is, why you want them in my story, and where to find your character's description.

Have fun everyone. I also added a few anime locations in there for more stories.
